name: Vodka Schweppes
description: Simple sweet drink that you can take wherever you are in your own local style.

ingredients.ingredient: Schweppes of your preferred taste, I like the Citrus found in Brazil but you can use other flavors

directions: Mix the vodka and the soda in the cup, preferably adding the vodka first so it blends well and that's it! Your homemade Smirnoff Ice aka Vodka Schweppes.
